oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Excerpt from Mary Margaret Lambert Oral History Interview, 2011 April 30
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
Excerpt from an oral history interview with Mary Margaret Lambert conducted on April 30, 2011 by Susannah Gibbons as part of the Flood 2010 Digital History Project. Away from Nashville at the time of the flood, Mary Margaret Lambert describes finding out about the death of her father Joseph Formosa Jr. and his wife Bessie Formosa, returning to Nashville, support from a neighbor who had lost everything.
The complete interview is available in the Special Collections Division.
